resources.string:
V2.0.7 14JUNE2015
NEW!! Added settings again - US and Metric unit support Add error check for new data. Preventing null fields. Layout cleaning
V2.0.6 9JUNE2015
Added back auto-complete for events
V2.0.6 6JUNE2015
NEW!!! Option to log RV's or even utility trailer's! Many many many layout and UI improvements
